Texts.Eng: A recovered note from an apex survivor.

It wasn't long before things got worse. Rather than make us work, they would just...eat some of us at random. I watched Rathcher get devoured last Tuesday. No checks and balances were made, no concessions...just death and servitude. How are we to survive? And what will be left of us?

They came from the sky, blazing our very atmosphere with their terrible plasma weapons. We'd never seen anything like these creatures, stepping out of their ships as if from some aquatic horror show! First they killed the eldest, and then forced the younger ones to work. Most did not survive the effort, and those that did were often killed for 'incorrectly' working.
